file_content.text: Thanks to you, Imperial spice addiction will soon be a thing of the past. Still, that's no excuse to start spicing.
Spice is crippling Imperial effectiveness. Please steal the Republic's cure quickly.
Agent Kayd, at your service, my lord. I apologize if you've run across the local spice fiends.
Pleasure, sir. I'm supposed to scan all personnel, but I'll waive the spice test for you.
Let me see your eyes, hunter. Good. These days you never know who's riding the spice.
Eyes clear, properly dilated. Breathing normal. Good. No sign of spice abuse.
It's a disgusting habit. Highly addictive, much to the Hutt Cartel's pleasure. They're making a fortune off Nar Shaddaa's addiction.
As we speak, it's turning our best men into vacant, slobbering spiceheads.
Spice abuse is a sign of weakness. Those who succumb to it deserve death.
Pathetic.
Ordering replacements will take time. Our presence here couldn't survive the cuts.
Strap down these weaklings and drain the spice from their veins.
Squeeze the spice out of them.
I like your methods, but we can't afford the hit to morale.
Illicit materials have no place in the Empire. Detox them, then dock their pay.
This calls for punishment.
I agree, sir. But conventional withdrawal is long, painful and messy.
Let 'em sample the local flavor. They'll come around.
Cut them a break.
Recreational spice use is a myth. One taste can turn a hardened soldier into a quivering mess.
I should sample this spice. For research.
Sounds fun.
Spice is no joking matter. One taste, then you're mopping up Hutt sick in exchange for another fix.
They're addicted. So what?
Spice addiction affects us all. It already cripples the Empire's operation on Nar Shaddaa.
Thankfully there's a solution. The Republic's secretly working on a cure for spice addiction. It works, and they're close to mass production.
If we steal their cure, our addiction epidemic would be solved. But the Republic's would not, leaving the Hutts a market.
I'll recover the Republic's research.
This cure will be ours.
I know hundreds of spice-sucking soldiers who will be in your debt. Eventually.
I'll be back with the cure. You get my credits ready.
If that's a job offer, I'm in.
Excellent. I'll prepare to divert the funds from our detox program.
Tell me where the Republic lab is. If I'm in the area, I may stop by.
Perhaps I could help.
Our spice-addled men would appreciate it. Uploading the coordinates now.
Ransack the Republic's labs. Take their research, then destroy everything. We don't want them salvaging the project.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
Fine. Be careful out there. Whatever you do, steer clear of the spice.
Spice use is illegal. Report all infractions by Imperial personnel.
